programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: Judgment Of The Cop Killer With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Jennifer Luick said she was having fun when she pinched Andrew Wirth's buttocks in a bar. That pinched resulted in the deaths of Jennifer and her boyfriend Greg Peters. Andrew Wirth sits down for an interview about the night that changed his life.

programme.title: Victim to Verdict: Christmas Parade Rampage
programme.sub-title: Victim to Verdict: Christmas Parade Rampage
programme.desc: The annual Christmas parade in Waukesha, Wis., is struck by tragedy when Darrel Brooks drives his SUV through the parade route; the tragedy turns into a spectacle when Brooks decides to represent himself at trial.

programme.desc: What happened today? Find out as Scripps News gets you up to speed on the day's events that everyone is talking about.

programme.title: Scripps News Reports
programme.sub-title: Harvest Interrupted: The Cost Of Enforcement
programme.desc: The impact of immigration raids and legal enforcement on farms and farming communities across America as a shortage of workers leads to crops rotting in the ground and concerns of rising prices.

programme.title: Scripps News Reports
programme.desc: How trade tensions and tariffs are impacting vital imports through our ports, the prices we pay, jobs and employment, and even the toy industry.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: When a chef's wife goes missing from Southern California, it initially appears she may have left voluntarily, yet, after months of investigation, detectives uncover she was the victim of a ruthless homicide and an even more savage cover up.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A vicious custody battle ends when one of the parents vanishes without a trace; law enforcement investigates the usual suspects only to uncover a seemingly premeditated murder and a sickening attempt to cover it up.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: When police stop investigating the disappearance of a family of atheists, an intrepid journalist picks up the torch and hunts down a mastermind hell-bent on revenge who resulted to kidnapping, extortion and murder.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: After a brutal killing at a construction site, homicide detectives track down a suspect who they've been eyeing from the beginning.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A deranged man terrorizes New York City in the late 1970s, leaving a trail of dead and wounded in his wake until a series of letters, a reluctant witness, and a parking ticket lead to his capture.
